channel.title: PI adding 634 items ERROR
channel.description:
[QUOTE]NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225 4 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 56336 at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:410) at client.drawInterface(client.java:8347) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:1897) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8142) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8892) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4669) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/QUOTE]
I don't know how to fix this :s can somebody help me? :)
